overview_of_class: This course is an examination of sex differences and similarities. Explanations for differences will be evaluated, as well as the effects of gender on achievement, relationships and mental health. Presented in a five-week format, this course meets for five Saturdays from 9:00 am to 4:00 pm: 5/13, 5/20, 5/27, 6/4, 6/10. First class attendance is mandatory. Carries social science credit.
name: Pyschology of Gender
title: SCS PSYCH 339-CN-17 Pyschology of Gender
